title: Update contact details: email, phone, and location in ContactCTA section

requirements.text: In the ContactCTA component, update the email address displayed in the contact info card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]) to 'saravana@espiritdecrops.com'. Also update any mailto: href associated with this email to use the same address.

quotes: email id change to this email id: saravana@espiritdecrops.com

acceptanceCriteria: The email displayed in the contact info card reads 'saravana@espiritdecrops.com'

requirements.text: In the ContactCTA component, update the phone number displayed in the contact info card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]/div[2]/div[2]) to '+91 7259145275'. Also update any tel: href associated with this phone to use the same number.
acceptanceCriteria: The phone number displayed in the contact info card reads '+91 7259145275'

requirements.text: In the ContactCTA component, update the location/address text displayed in the contact info card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]) to 'Bangalore – All India Remote Available'.

quotes: location to Bangalore -all india remote valiable

acceptanceCriteria: The location displayed in the contact info card reads 'Bangalore – All India Remote Available'

constraints: Only update the three specified contact detail fields: email, phone, and location
Do not alter any other text, layout, or styling in the ContactCTA component
nonGoals: Changing the contact form fields or submission logic
Modifying any other section of the website
